Resource.item: Polls
Libraries
Models
Self-assessment test
Polls
Questionnaires
Meeting
Static Questionnaire :
The simplest type of questionnaire. Answers are fixed, but you can sort their visualization at random.
Self-assessment test

It will be possible to choose libraries from which select questions to present to the user. Once answered every question, the user will be able to see corrections ( in case of automatically evaluable questions) and, possibly suggestions about the knowledge he/she lacks or custom texts, inserted by the creator of the question.
Questions library:
Questions added to a library can be used to quickly create several types of questionnaire.
Questionnaire model:

Permette di creare un modello statico e pubblico di sondaggio (con impostazioni di base, domanda, ecc): altri gestori del servizio potranno utilizzare tale modello (con le relative impostazioni) per creare dei sondaggi personalizzati.
Random Questionnaire:
It will be possible to select how many questions, for each difficulty level and available library, will be presented to the user. To every user will be displayed a different set of questions.
SELECT THE QUESTIONNAIRE TYPE BY CLICKING "CHOOSE"
Poll:
Like the static questionnaire, but you can not automatically evaluate answers.
Wizard
Advanced
You do not have permission to view this page
Inserire, se si desidera, una descrizione che riassume i contenuti del sondaggio, o con indicazioni e suggerimenti da fornire all'utente prima che inizi la compilazione.
Enter a name for the poll (mandatory)

After the compilation of the poll the user will be allowed to:
Define poll default language
Display answer (tick the box if YES)
Display correction (tick the box if YES)
Modify the given answer (tick the box to activate)
Display tips (tick the box if YES)
Display correction (tick the box if YES)
maximum time must be an integer (0 the poll is time-indipendent)
Rating scale must be an integer
Tick the box if you want questions in random order
The poll will be available to:

ATTENTION: by clicking "Create" the poll will be saved and you will be able to add answers to it. Once entered them, go to the questionnaire list and click the red button (that will become green) next to the library in order to enable compilation.
GENERAL
General section, where you can add the basilar information about the poll.
ADMINISTERING METHOD
In this section choose the methods by which users will answer the poll questions.
RECIPIENTS
In this section it is possible to choose users to whom dispatch the poll.
